title: Yahboom Robot
description:
YahboomRobot APP is a robot control software in smart devices. Everyone can directly control Yahboom robots using official controller in the software.


Features:
-Brand New UI Design, User-Friendly Interface. 
-Stronger Controllability, Simpler Way to Learn STEM：STEM education becomes easy & fun as you can also master robot freely to sing, dance or light. 
-Supporting Yahboom Robot car: Jetbot, Roboduino, Omniduino, G1 Tank, 4WD Robot car, TrikeBot car, 6WD robot, micro:bit camera platform.
-Multi-Language User Interface :Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English.

Support:
-You can visit the official website: www.yahboom.com for more information
-Support email: support@yahboom.com
descriptionHTML:
YahboomRobot APP is a robot control software in smart devices. Everyone can directly control Yahboom robots using official controller in the software.


Features:
-Brand New UI Design, User-Friendly Interface.
-Stronger Controllability, Simpler Way to Learn STEM：STEM education becomes easy & fun as you can also master robot freely to sing, dance or light.
-Supporting Yahboom Robot car: Jetbot, Roboduino, Omniduino, G1 Tank, 4WD Robot car, TrikeBot car, 6WD robot, micro:bit camera platform.
-Multi-Language User Interface :Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English.

Support:
